title: Khloe Kardashian stuns in a skin tight burgundy dress and thigh high boots while out for lunch
text:
Fall is in full swing and Khloe Kardashian is already dressing for the season.

The 35-year-old Keeping Up With the Kardashian's star stepped out on Wednesday looking autumn chic in a tight dress and tall boots while out and about for lunch.

Khloe headed inside to Plata Taqueria & Cantina in Agoura Hills before munching on some Mexican good.

Stepping out: Khloe Kardashian stepped out on Wednesday looking autumn chic in a tight dress and tall boots while out and about for lunch

Her dress was burgundy and long sleeve and showed off her toned figure.

She wore a pair of tall thigh- boots that were a light brown color and had a tall heel.

The reality star wore her long blonde hair down in loose waves as she carried a Dior clutch in her hand as she headed inside.

Stylish: Her dress was burgundy and long sleeve and showed off her toned figure

At the end of September it was announced that Khloe's best friend Malika Haqq is expecting her first child.

Khloe just couldn't contain her excitement and took to her social media to share the news: 'My baby is having a baby!!!!!!!! I am literally so so so excited!!!! Congratulations Mika!!! I love you!!!!'

The Revenge Body's star was born back in April of 2018 with her longtime best friend by her side the entire way, and now the tables have turned.

Details: The reality star wore her long blonde hair down in loose waves as she carried a Dior clutch in her hand as she headed inside

For awhile, Malika doubled as not just her best friend, but her assistant too. But Khloe wasn't having it when trolls came for her bestie saying Malika wouldn't be famous if it wasn't for Khloe.

'She's been my BFF since we were children. Loyalty and love means more to me than anything else ever could. Fame is fleeting. Malika is not,' she responded to the comments.

Malika was in the room along with Khloe's sisters and her mother Kris Jenner when Khloe gave birth to baby True and often would visit Khloe in Cleveland when she was dating her ex and father to True, Tristan Thompson.
description: Fall is in full swing and Khloe Kardashian is already dressing for the season. The 35-year-old Keeping Up With the Kardashian's star stepped out on Wednesday looking autumn chic.
